title: Update contexts/README.md with dogfooding and cross-project improvement pattern
description: The contexts README should emphasize: 1) projects MUST use the context system they define, 2) how improvements propagate across projects, 3) the self-improvement loop.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add 'Dogfooding Requirement' section - projects defining contexts MUST use them
Add 'Cross-Project Improvement' section explaining how one fix benefits all projects
Add 'Self-Improvement Loop' section: find gap -> ask user -> create story -> Ralph fixes
Add example of context-audit workflow for discovering gaps
Update 'How to Reference Contexts' with current @context: syntax
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: docs: US-122 contexts README dogfooding docs
